import React from'react';class ErrorBoundary extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={hasError:false// info: null
};}static getDerivedStateFromError(error){return{hasError:true,info:error};}componentDidCatch(error,errorInfo){console.log('error: ',error);console.log('errorInfo: ',errorInfo);}render(){const{hasError}=this.state;const{fallback,children}=this.props;if(hasError){return fallback;}return children;}}export default ErrorBoundary;
